username.symbols: This field can only contain the following characters 0-9; A-Z; a-z; _ ; -
username.min: This field must contain at least 6 characters
username.max: This field must contain no more than 30 characters

firstName.symbols: This field can only contain the following characters A-Z; a-z; А-Я; а-я
firstName.min: This field must contain at least 1 characters
firstName.max: This field must contain no more than 50 characters

lastName.symbols: This field can only contain the following characters A-Z; a-z; А-Я; а-я
lastName.min: This field must contain at least 1 characters
lastName.max: This field must contain no more than 50 characters

errors.birthday: A user under 13 cannot create a profile

aboutMe.max: This field must contain no more than 200 characters
